description:
It’s unclear why many leftists didn’t have mothers who raised them to act like normal people in public, but this appears to be a common characteristic among the most woke and radical liberals.

An unhinged woman who more than likely voted for Kamala verbally harassed a cute little couple just trying to enjoy a meal. And well, it’s worse than you think.

“You’re a disgusting, sick, vile f—king weirdo”

The story behind the video: A viral clip posted last week shows a leftist woman in a Luigi Mangione fan shirt screaming at an elderly man for wearing a Trump hat.

The incident occurred at the Los Panchos restaurant in Richmond,… pic.twitter.com/37ARIkBMic
— Andy Ngo (@MrAndyNgo)
title: Unhinged Luigi Mangione fangirl verbally assaults sweet elderly couple for wearing a MAGA hat
